00009 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget *parent) :
00010     QMainWindow(parent),
00011     m_ui(new Ui::MainWindow)
00012 {
00013     m_ui->setupUi(this);
00014     //create GL window and parent it to this
00015     m_gl = new gameManager(this);
00016     //set main grid layout for the main window
00017     m_ui->s_mainWindowGridLayout->addWidget(m_gl,0,0,2,1);
00018     // grab keyboard input from the central widget
00019     // that houses the main gameplay
00020     m_ui->centralwidget->grabKeyboard();
00021     // the play button
00022     connect(m_ui->m_play,SIGNAL(clicked()),m_gl,SLOT(setPlay()));
00023     // the pause button
00024     connect(m_ui->m_pause,SIGNAL(clicked()),m_gl,SLOT(setPause()));
00025     // the game resume button
00026     connect(m_ui->m_resume,SIGNAL(clicked()),m_gl,SLOT(setResume()));
00027     // the game exit button
00028     connect(m_ui->m_exit,SIGNAL(clicked()),m_gl,SLOT(exit_game()));
00029     //progress bar
00030     connect(this,SIGNAL(updateBar()),this,SLOT(updateProgBar()));
00031     // label to update the basket's shield value
00032     connect(m_gl,SIGNAL(updateShield()),this,SLOT(updateShieldLabel()));
00033     // label to update player's score value
00034     connect(m_gl,SIGNAL(updateScore()),this,SLOT(updateScoreLabel()));
00035 }

00043 void MainWindow::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *_event)
00044 {
00045     // once we have processed any key here pass the event
00046     // onto the GLWindow class to do more processing
00047     m_gl->processKeyUp(_event);
00048 }
00049 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 void MainWindow::keyPressEvent(
00051                                QKeyEvent *_event
00052                               )
00053 {
00054     // check if there is any update in number of catches
00055     catchprog();
00056     // this method is called every time the main window recives a key event.
00057     // we then switch on the key value and set the camera in the GLWindow
00058     switch (_event->key())
00059     {
00060       case Qt::Key_Escape : QApplication::exit(EXIT_SUCCESS); break;
00061       case Qt::Key_F : showFullScreen(); break;
00062       case Qt::Key_N : showNormal(); break;
00063       case Qt::Key_Up: m_gl->moveBasket_gl();
00064       default : break;
00065     }
00066     // once we have processed any key here pass the event
00067     // onto the GLWindow class to do more processing
00068     m_gl->processKeyDown(_event);
00069 }
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 bool MainWindow::catchprog()
00072 {
00073     //if there is an increase in catch count, then return true
00074     currCatchCount = m_gl->catchProgress();
00075     if (prevCatchCount < currCatchCount)
00076     {
00077         // emit the signal to update bar
00078         emit updateBar();
00079         prevCatchCount = currCatchCount;
00080         return true;
00081     }
00082     else
00083     {
00084         prevCatchCount = currCatchCount;
00085         return false;
00086     }
00087 }
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 void MainWindow::updateProgBar()
00090 {
00091     int progvalue = m_gl->catchProgress();
00092     //progress = value
00093     //std::cout<<"\n on_m_progress_valueChanged: value = "<<value;
00094     m_ui->m_progress->setValue(progvalue);
00095 }
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 template<typename S>
00098 std::string value_to_string(const S& val)
00099 {
00100     std::stringstream ss;
00101     ss<<val;
00102     return ss.str();
00103 }
00104 void MainWindow::updateShieldLabel()
00105 {
00106     int shieldVal = m_gl->shieldLeft();
00107     std::string shield =  value_to_string(shieldVal);
00108     m_ui->m_shield->setText(shield.c_str());
00109 }
00110 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void MainWindow::updateScoreLabel()
00112 {
00113     int scoreVal = m_gl->playerScore();
00114     std::string score = value_to_string(scoreVal);
00115     m_ui->m_score->setText(score.c_str());
00116 }
